name: Audiowave Racing
description:
This is a 3D racing game where you drive on top of a track that is constantly changing its colour and shape. You can also import your own music (sadly only .OGG file type) to see its effects on the track.

This is essentially a prototype and as such is far from a completed game, however I will most likely be making improvements to it over time to turn it into a full-fledged game.
